posts.post_content: Come on, he's a black 3/3 flyer for 3. Sure, he's not great, and [Necrogen Scudder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necrogen Scudder) is generally better, but ideally this guy should die fast/end the game quick. He would really suck against red burn though.

posts.post_content: [Necrogen Scudder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necrogen Scudder) has a rating of almost triple this guy's. That doesn't seem fair, since this guy was basically the Scudder of the first Mirrodin block, and we all know creatures have gotten far stronger over time. Plus, if you play the drake and they bolt it before it hits them, then you've lost less than if you'd played the Scudder.

posts.post_content: Necrogen Scudder has a much higher rating because it's much better. You know EXACTLY how much the scudder is going to hurt you for- no more than three. This guy, though, you don't know. Worse case, he can get trapped by a minister of impediments or a pacifism, sit on the field, and quickly kill you. Three spells will get played in no more than two turns anyway.
